responses.user_message: Tell me a story about my favorite animal

Once upon a time, in the lush green savanna of Africa, lived a little elephant named Ellie.  [gentle] Ellie wasn't just any elephant; she had the brightest, most curious eyes and the wiggliest trunk you ever did see! She lived with her mama, her papa, and her big brother, Earl, in a herd of many, many elephants.
